languages.text: {n}Джай нависает над игровым полем и принимается напевать тягучую ифритскую мелодию, пощелкивая в такт {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}аугментированными{/g} пальцами. Крыса застывает на месте, прислушиваясь к новому ритму, а затем гонит шарик прямо в лузу.{/n} "Эту победу я посвящаю вам, шерин!"

{n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай нависает над игровым полем и принимается напевать тягучую ифритскую мелодию, пощелкивая в такт {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}аугментированными{/g} пальцами. Крыса застывает на месте, прислушиваясь к новому ритму, а затем гонит шарик прямо в лузу.{/n} "Эту победу я посвящаю вам, шерин!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her augmented fingers in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the pocket.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

{n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

languages.text: {n}Penchée sur le plateau de jeu, Jae se met à fredonner une mélodie éfrite lente tout en claquant des {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}doigts en rythme{/g}. Le rat s'arrête net, comme s'il tendait l'oreille à ce nouveau tempo, avant de diriger la bille tout droit dans le trou rouge.{/n} « Je vous dédie cette victoire, shereen ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Penchée sur le plateau de jeu, Jae se met à fredonner une mélodie éfrite lente tout en claquant des doigts en rythme. Le rat s'arrête net, comme s'il tendait l'oreille à ce nouveau tempo, avant de diriger la bille tout droit dans le trou rouge.{/n} « Je vous dédie cette victoire, shereen ! »

{n}Penchée sur le plateau de jeu, Jae se met à fredonner une mélodie éfrite lente tout en claquant des doigts en rythme. Le rat s'arrête net, comme s'il tendait l'oreille à ce nouveau tempo, avant de diriger la bille tout droit dans le trou rouge.{/n} « Je vous dédie cette victoire, shereen ! »

languages.text: {n}Jae se inclina sobre el tablero de juego y comienza a tararear una lenta melodía de Efreet, chasqueando sus {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}dedos aumentados{/g} al compás de la música. La rata se frena en seco, escucha el nuevo ritmo con atención y luego empuja la bola directamente por el orificio.{/n} «¡Le dedico esta victoria, shereen!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se inclina sobre el tablero de juego y comienza a tararear una lenta melodía de Efreet, chasqueando sus dedos aumentados al compás de la música. La rata se frena en seco, escucha el nuevo ritmo con atención y luego empuja la bola directamente por el orificio.{/n} «¡Le dedico esta victoria, shereen!».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは遊戯盤の上に身を乗り出し、イフリートのメロディを口ずさみながら、音楽に合わせて{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}オーグメントの指{/g}を鳴らす。ネズミはその新たなリズムを耳にしてピタリと止まり、ボールを赤い穴に転がした。{/n}「この勝利をあんたに捧げるよ、シェリーン！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは遊戯盤の上に身を乗り出し、イフリートのメロディを口ずさみながら、音楽に合わせてオーグメントの指を鳴らす。ネズミはその新たなリズムを耳にしてピタリと止まり、ボールを赤い穴に転がした。{/n}「この勝利をあんたに捧げるよ、シャリーン！」

languages.text: {n}婕伊靠在游戏板上，以悠扬的节奏哼唱起了艾弗里特的歌谣，伴着音乐敲着{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}手指{/g}。老鼠停下来，听着新的旋律，随后直接把球推进了红色的洞里。{/n}“我把这次胜利献给你，亲爱的！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊靠在游戏板上，以悠扬的节奏哼唱起了艾弗里特的歌谣，伴着音乐敲着手指。老鼠停下来，听着新的旋律，随后直接把球推进了红色的洞里。{/n}“我把这次胜利献给你，亲爱的！”
{n}婕伊靠在游戏板上，以悠扬的节奏哼唱起了艾弗里特的歌谣，伴着音乐敲着手指。老鼠停下来，听着新的旋律，随后直接把球推进了红色的洞里。{/n}“我把这次胜利献给你，亲爱的！”

languages.text: {n}Jae beugt sich über das Spielbrett und summt eine langsame Efreet-Melodie und schnippt dazu im Takt mit ihren {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmentierten Fingern{/g}. Die Ratte hält inne, hört auf den neuen Rhythmus und schiebt die Kugel dann genau in das rote Loch.{/n} "Ich widme Euch diesen Sieg, Shereen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae beugt sich über das Spielbrett und summt eine langsame Efreet-Melodie und schnippt dazu im Takt mit ihren augmentierten Fingern. Die Ratte hält inne, hört auf den neuen Rhythmus und schiebt die Kugel dann genau in das rote Loch.{/n} "Ich widme Euch diesen Sieg, Shereen!"

{n}Jae beugt sich über das Spielbrett und summt eine langsame Efreet-Melodie und schnippt dazu im Takt mit ihren augmentierten Fingern. Die Ratte hält inne, hört auf den neuen Rhythmus und schiebt die Kugel dann genau in das rote Loch.{/n} "Ich widme Euch diesen Sieg, Shereen!"

languages.text: {n}Jae, oyun tahtasına doğru eğilerek aheste bir İfrit melodisi mırıldanmaya başlıyor. Müzikle uyumlu bir şekilde {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}ogmentli parmaklarını{/g} şaklatıyor. Sıçan, yolu üzerinde aniden durarak yeni ritmi dinlemeye başlıyor ve topu doğruca kırmızı deliğe götürüyor.{/n} "Bu zaferi sana adıyorum şirinim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans over the game board and starts humming a slow Efreet melody, snapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} in time with the music. The rat stops dead in its tracks, listening to the new rhythm, and then drives the ball right into the red hole.{/n} "I dedicate this victory to you, shereen!"
